scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run platform:dev"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && npm run platform:build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run frontend:start" "npm run backend:start" "npm run platform:start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../platform && npm install
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run frontend:watch" "npm run backend:watch" "npm run platform:watch"
